original_text: And every one had four faces, and every one had four wings.
korean_text: 그들에게 각각 네 얼굴과 네 날개가 있고

sentences.original_text: And every one had four faces
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각각 네 개의 얼굴을 가지고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and every one had four wings
sentences.korean_translation: 각각 네 개의 날개를 가지고 있었다
